subject: english
title: Grade 1 English Language Arts
description: Foundation reading, writing, and language skills for first grade students

phonics.title: Phonics
phonics.description: Learn letter sounds and how to blend them into words

letter_sounds.title: Letter Sounds
letter_sounds.description: Learn the sounds that letters make
letter_sounds.learning_objective: Students will be able to identify and produce the sounds of all 26 letters

blending_sounds.title: Blending Sounds
blending_sounds.description: Blend letter sounds together to make words
blending_sounds.learning_objective: Students will be able to blend 2-3 letter sounds to form simple words

simple_words.title: Simple Words
simple_words.learning_objective: Students will be able to read simple CVC (consonant-vowel-consonant) words

reading.title: Reading
reading.description: Learn to read simple sentences and stories

sight_words.title: Sight Words
sight_words.description: Learn common words that appear frequently in reading
sight_words.learning_objective: Students will be able to recognize and read 25 common sight words

simple_sentences.title: Simple Sentences
simple_sentences.description: Read simple sentences with familiar words
simple_sentences.learning_objective: Students will be able to read simple sentences with sight words and phonetic words

reading_comprehension.title: Reading Comprehension
reading_comprehension.learning_objective: Students will be able to answer simple questions about what they read

writing.title: Writing
writing.description: Learn to write letters, words, and simple sentences

letter_formation.title: Letter Formation
letter_formation.description: Learn to write uppercase and lowercase letters
letter_formation.learning_objective: Students will be able to write all 26 letters in uppercase and lowercase

writing_words.title: Writing Words
writing_words.description: Write simple words by sounding them out
writing_words.learning_objective: Students will be able to write simple CVC words using phonetic spelling

writing_sentences.title: Writing Sentences
writing_sentences.description: Write simple sentences with capital letters and periods
writing_sentences.learning_objective: Students will be able to write simple sentences with proper capitalization and punctuation
